attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After hearing the regret that Mr Dennis will Step Down as Race Director for Mclaren Mercades Should his 20+ Years of hard work and consistent Succesfull Championships be overlooked. I believe only a few deserve such an acolade, and While i will one day be in the running, I feel Ron should get what he deserves. And if any should replace Mosley or Bernie. We have our Man
Many thanks.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
